data.text2: Select each piece of equipment to view the results of your team's first assessment.
data.text3:
TVA-1000B

No chemicals were detected with the TVA-1000B.
data.text4:
XRF

No heavy metals were detected in the soil with the XRF.
data.text5:
451P

Using the 451P, measurements in the billeting area were at 0.15 mR/hr. Measurements tapered off dramatically as we left the billeting area and went through the rest of the camp. Measurements were 0.005 mR/hr outside of the billeting area and in the rest of the camp.
